name: Giant Flea Swarm
description: A medium-sized swarm of aggressive giant fleas that overwhelms its foes with overwhelming numbers and continuous biting.
memorable: The ability to sense blood makes it a persistent threat, especially to weakened creatures.
goals: To attack and drain blood from living creatures.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other swarming or generally small-sized creatures.
environment: Typically found in habitats where prey is abundant, such as near animals or in swamps.
strengths: Immune to various conditions and resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
weaknesses: Cannot regain hit points, requiring caution in sustained engagements.
attacks: Bite attack that inflicts significant piercing damage to creatures in its space.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Sense allows the swarm to track living creatures by their scent.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, enhancing its tracking abilities.
skills: Has average perception, making it somewhat aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Occupies the same space as other creatures, enhancing its tactical threat.
Long jump of up to 30 feet with or without a running start.
It can inflict damage to creatures starting their turn within its space.
Defense against being incapacitated due to various condition immunities.
Relies on its swarm mechanics to overwhelm opponents.
test_queries: medium beast swarm with keen smell
